For the next 2 days, B&H Photo has on sale the Magnus PV-7451M Tripod/Monopod with 3-way pan/tilt head for only $49.95, saving you $40. It appears to be a decent beginner tripod and panning head.

Magnus PV-7451M Tripod/Monopod

  • 10 lb Load Capacity
  • 3-Way Pan and Tilt Head
  • Center Column Converts to Monopod
  • Quick Release Plate
  • 27″ to 73″ Tripod Height Range
  • 3-Section Tripod Legs
  • Flip-Locks for Leg Height Adjustment
  • Telescopic Pan Handle
  • Rubber Feet with Enclosed Spikes
  • Padded Carrying Case Included

Featuring a center column that converts to a four-section monopod, the Magnus PV-741M Tripod brings enhanced flexibility by enabling you to quickly switch between tripod to monopod shooting without missing a beat. It is equipped with a three-way head that supports loads up to 10 lb and is suitable for both photo and video applications. The head provides pan and tilt control, as well as a horizontally tilting camera platform for switching to 90° portrait orientation. For easy camera attachment and removal, a quick release plate with a standard 1/4″-20 screw and video register pin is included.

The tripod reaches a maximum height of 73″ with the center column extended and offers a minimum working height of 27″. When the center column is removed for monopod use and is fully extended, it reaches a height of 64.8″. To allow for use on virtually any surface, the tripod legs features rubber feet that can be rotated to reveal metal spikes. A padded carrying case is included for convenient storage and transport.

Key Features

  • Adjustable center column converts to a four-section monopod
  • Three-way pan and tilt head with independent locks
  • Tilt friction control
  • 3-section tripod legs
  • Flip-lock on each leg for independent height adjustment
  • Locking mid-level spreader for added rigidity
  • Rubber feet with enclosed metal spikes for use on a variety of surfaces
  • Quick release plate with standard 1/4″-20 camera screw and video register pin
  • Telescoping pan handle
  • Two integrated bubble levels; one on camera platform, one on legs below 3-way head
  • Padded carrying case included
